description:
From producing dye from tiny cactus bugs to handcrafting bespoke suits for the world’s wealthiest clients, we explore 12 fascinating jobs done by women around the world.

MORE STILL STANDING VIDEOS:
How One Of The Oldest Forms Of BBQ Is Preserved By One Mayan Chef | Still Standing
https://youtu.be/KFfBh1PJrP0
How Judaism's Most Sacred Prayer Object Is Made With 3000-Year-Old Techniques | Still Standing
https://youtu.be/_OYxADDluNI
How Himalayan Black Salt Is Made At Dangerous Temperatures In India | Still Standing
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wXm9T_28Ijo

title: 12 Fascinating Jobs Done By Women Around The World | Still Standing | Business Insider
